articles.title: Some 1,500 Americans Are Still in Afghanistan, U.S. Says - The New York Times
articles.description: The U.S., U.K. and Australia warned of an unspecified threat outside the Kabul airport and told citizens to stay away. The warnings came in the last days of the U.S. evacuation, as thousands of desperate foreigners and Afghans tried to escape Taliban rule.
articles.content:

articles.title: 2020 was Europe's hottest year on record 'by a considerable amount,' scientists say - CNN
